languages.text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.
languages.original_text: Первая атака этим огнеметом в бою наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g} ксеносам, псайкерам и демонам, равный 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} цели. {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Горение{/g}, накладываемое этим огнеметом, наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} ксеносам, псайкерам и демонам, равный 2% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} цели.

traits.locale_text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional direct damage to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's maximum wounds. The burning effect applied by this flamer deals additional damage equal to 2% of the target's maximum wounds to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

languages.original_text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

traits.locale_text: Первая атака этим огнеметом в бою наносит дополнительный прямой урон ксеносам, псайкерам и демонам, равный 10% от максимального здоровья цели. Горение, накладываемое этим огнеметом, наносит дополнительный урон ксеносам, псайкерам и демонам, равный 2% от максимального здоровья цели.

Первая атака этим огнеметом в бою наносит дополнительный прямой урон ксеносам, псайкерам и демонам, равный 10% от максимального здоровья цели. Горение, накладываемое этим огнеметом, наносит дополнительный урон ксеносам, псайкерам и демонам, равный 2% от максимального здоровья цели.

languages.text: 每场战斗中，此火焰喷射器首次攻击时，会对异形、灵能者与恶魔造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，等同于目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。此火焰喷射器的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果会对异形、灵能者与恶魔造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于目标最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的2%。
languages.original_text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗中，此火焰喷射器首次攻击时，会对异形、灵能者与恶魔造成额外直击伤害，等同于目标最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的10%。此火焰喷射器的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}会对异形、灵能者与恶魔造成额外伤害，等同于目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的2%。

languages.text: 戦闘中のこのフレイマーによる最初の攻撃は、ゼノ、サイカー、ディーモンに、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大負傷{/g}の10%に等しい追加の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。このフレイマーが与える{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果は、ゼノ、サイカー、ディーモンに、ターゲットの最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}の2%と同等の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

traits.locale_text: 戦最初の攻撃で、ゼノ、サイカー、ディーモンに、ターゲットの最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の10%に等しい追加の直接ダメージを付与。ゼノ、サイカー、ディーモンへの{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}で、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大負傷{/g}の2%と同等の追加ダメージを付与できる。

languages.text: El primer ataque realizado en combate con este lanzallamas causa {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} adicional a xenos, psíquicos y daemons, equivalente al 10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas del objetivo. El efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} aplicado por este lanzallamas causa un 2 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo como {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a xenos, psíquicos y daemons.
languages.original_text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

traits.locale_text: El primer ataque realizado en combate con este lanzallamas causa daño directo adicional a xenos, psíquicos y daemons, equivalente al 10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas del objetivo. El {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} aplicado por este lanzallamas causa un 2 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo como daño adicional a xenos, psíquicos y daemons.

languages.text: Der erste Angriff im Kampf mit diesem Flammenwerfer fügt Xenos, Psionikern und Dämonen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} in Höhe von 10 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels zu. Der {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Effekt, der von diesem Flammenwerfer verursacht wird, fügt Xenos, Psionikern und Dämonen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe von 2 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels zu.
languages.original_text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

traits.locale_text: Der erste Angriff im Kampf mit diesem Flammenwerfer fügt Xenos, Psionikern und Dämonen zusätzlichen Direktschaden zu, und zwar entsprechend 10 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels. Der {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}, der von diesem Flammenwerfer angewendet wird, fügt Xenos, Psionikern und Dämonen zusätzlichen Schaden zu, und zwar entsprechend 2 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels.

languages.text: La première attaque menée à l'aide de ce lance-flammes lors d'un combat inflige aux xénos, aux psykers et aux démons un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} supplémentaires égal à 10 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de la cible. L'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} appliqué par ce lance-flammes inflige aux xénos, aux psykers et aux démons un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal à 2 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de la cible.
languages.original_text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

traits.locale_text: La première attaque menée à l'aide de ce lance-flammes lors d'un combat inflige aux xénos, aux psykers et aux démons un nombre de points de dégâts directs supplémentaires égal à 10 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de la cible. L'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} appliqué par ce lance-flammes inflige aux xénos, aux psykers et aux démons un nombre de points de dégâts supplémentaires égal à 2 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de la cible.

languages.text: Çatışmada bu alevsaçan ile yapılan ilk saldırı; zenolara, ruhsezerlere ve iblislere ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} verir. Bu değer, hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'una eşittir. Bu alevsaçanın uyguladığı {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} etkisi; zenolara, ruhsezerlere ve iblislere hedefin maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %2'si kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.
